data.title: Who is Kourtney Kardashian's husband, Travis Barker?
data.meta_description: TRAVIS Barker and Kourtney Kardashian officially tied the knot - three times.Over a year after their final wedding ceremony, it was revealed on Novemb
data.text:
TRAVIS Barker and Kourtney Kardashian officially tied the knot - three times.

Over a year after their final wedding ceremony, it was revealed on November 4, 2023, the celebrity couple had welcomed their first child together.

Who is Travis Barker?

Born November 14, 1975, Travis Barker is an American musician who serves as the drummer for Blink-182.

Over the years, he has also played in several other groups including +44 and Box Car Racer.

Rolling Stone named Travis one of the 100 Greatest Drummers of All Time and referred to him as "punk's first superstar drummer."

Outside of music, Travis is known for his tattoo collection. He has over 100 tattoos all over his body.

What is Travis Barker's net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Travis has an estimated net worth of around $50million.

His fortune not only comes from his music, but also from his MTV reality series, Meet The Barkers, which aired from 2005 to 2006.

He is the founder of the fashion company Famous Stars and Straps, and the label LaSalle Records.

The drummer has even had small roles in several movies and TV shows including American Pie; Two Guys, A Girl, And A Pizza Place; The Simpsons, and CSI: Crime Scene Investigation.

Does Travis have any kids?

Travis is a father of two children, whom he shares with his former wife Shanna Moakler - an American model, actress, and reality television star.

In 2003, the couple welcomed their first child, Landon, who is known as a musician and social media influencer.

Two years later, the couple then welcomed their second child, Alabama, on December 24, 2005.

Like her brother, the teen is also known as a social media influencer and has managed to obtain over 2 million followers on Instagram.

Travis was married to Shanna from 2004 to 2008 after divorcing his first wife, Melissa Kennedy, in 2002.

He is also still a father figure to his former stepdaughter, Atiana De La Hoya, who is the daughter of Shanna and her ex, Oscar De La Hoya.

It was announced in November 2023 that Travis had welcomed his third biological child, a son named Rocky with Kourtney.

When did Travis and Kourtney Kardashian get married?

On October 17, 2021, Travis Barker proposed to Kourtney Kardashian by popping the question at a beachside hotel in Montecito, California.

The two held their first wedding in April post-Grammys at a chapel in Las Vegas - but declared it "practice" as no license was involved.

On Sunday, May 15, 2022, Travis and Kourtney officially tied the knot in a courthouse wedding in Santa Barbara, California.

The duo then hitched a ride in a convertible with a sign that said: "just married."

Days later, most of the Kardashian-Jenner clan flew into Italy to celebrate the marriage of Kourtney and Travis in a third ceremony held at the Castello Brown castle.
